title: Army Creating Cyber Units With Soldiers, Civilians
text:
31 Army Creating Cyber Units With Soldiers, Civilians 
Military.com: YOKOTA AIR BASE, Japan -- The Army is looking for soldiers and civilians to serve in new cyber units charged with protecting critical stateside infrastructure and creating "effects" on the battlefield in support of conventional forces. The challenge: Attracting the creative, energetic talent typically drawn to the freewheeling tech sector.
